attributes.action: Consider with an open mind the rationale for closing Penarth Jocentre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Penarth Jobcentre is an accessible space used by Jobseekers, older people, young people, people living with disablities, workers who need tax credit support, lone parents, employed people who need advice and more.  The intention of the DWP is to close this office. We petition the Prime minister to review the rationale of this and to keep this resourse open for the Penarth Tax Payers
attributes.creator_name: Jimmy Gill(in a personal TU capacity)
